title: Presidential nominations sent to the senate, 7-16-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 16, 2009

 



Presidential nominations sent to the senate, 7-16-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                July 16, 2009  NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:   Jacqueline A. Berrien, of New York, to be a Member of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission for a term expiring July 1, 2014, vice Christine M. Griffin, term expired. Kenneth Albert Spearman, of Florida, to be a Member of the Farm Credit Administration Board, Farm Credit Administration for a term expiring May 21, 2014, vice Nancy C. Pellett, term expired.
